pkgmetadata.longdescription: Thurstonian CFA and Thurstonian IRT Modeling // Fit Thurstonian forced-choice models (CFA (simple and factor) and IRT) in R. This package allows for the analysis of item response modeling (IRT) as well as confirmatory factor analysis (CFA) in the Thurstonian framework. Currently, estimation can be performed by 'Mplus' and 'lavaan'. References: Brown Maydeu-Olivares (2011) doi:10.1177/0013164410375112; Jansen, M. T., Schulze, R. (in review). The Thurstonian linked block design: Improving Thurstonian modeling for paired comparison and ranking data.; Maydeu-Olivares Bckenholt (2005) doi:10.1037/1082-989X.10.3.285.
